panese sites (stubbornly avoiding the evil fish and the gist of gist until =

iner by then and this would be the incident MissB included where the bakufu=

e of things... the fish is too vague for me to figure out.  Are they saying=

 And what's this "Mitsuru"?  Kojima four must be Koshima Shirou (are "j" an=

nd they're saying he changed it to Sagara Souzou ("entire three"?), but I'm=

icer Mitsuru (changed name Sagara entire three)"

nks are in Japanese :-/<<
